Class Deck1

java.lang.Object
  Deck1

public class Deck1
extends java.lang.Object

Ben Kaufman CS 110 Java War Card Game this class creates the arraylist deck object and has methods that allow you to add remove and shuffle card objects in a deck arraylist as well as return the arraylists size and whether or not its empty

(package private)  int current_card_count

          initializes the deck arraylist
 
Method Summary
 void add(Card c)
          Adds a card object to a deck arraylist
 int cardsRemaining()
          returns the number of objects remaining in a deck arraylist object
 Card dealCard()
          Removes a card object from an deck arraylist
 void freshDeck()
          Loads the deck arraylist with all of the card objects
 boolean isEmpty()
          returns true if there are no remaining card objects in a deck arraylist
 void shuffle()
          shuffles the card objects in a deck arraylist
